title: How to plant under 3 minutes |Gardening wit Konzept Garden

subtasks: Examine the area for suitable planting location
Measure the distance between rows and plants
Position seeds or plants at the correct depth and spacing
Cover the seeds or plants with soil
Time the planting process to ensure it takes under three minutes
** Examine the area for a suitable planting location.
** Measure the distance between rows and plants.
** Position seeds or plants at the correct depth and spacing.
** Cover the seeds or plants with soil.
** Time the planting process to ensure it takes under three minutes.
